name: gobby time
description:
WASD to move, Q to throw bombs, and left click, hold, and release to throw rocks.

Assets:

Synty Mini Fantasy Characters, FlatKit (toon shader), and Ultimate SFX Bundle all from the Unity Asset Store.  I also made the character controller before the game jam started. Everything else was done during the jam.  

The music composition was made by Spencer, you can check out his work here:    https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPfWxv92nmBGUCDLBS0sHzQ

Right out the gate there's obviously some resolution problems with the UI and what not, unfortunately I didn't have time to test anything. I got 'er built 3 minutes before submission time and didn't test at all. I figured since it looked fine in the unity editor it would look fine once its built...Also, some SFX aren't working at all.  Oh well. First game jam and I learned a ton.
